Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1967...
Injured on 5/21/1967 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/1969 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/14/1969 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1973 (Going to NYM: LF C. Lopez. Going to CHC: RF J. Wockenfuss)...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 4/16/1978...
Injured on 5/1/1979 with a Broken Elbow, out for 8-9 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to NYM: C J. Wockenfuss. Going to CHC: 3B R. Knight)...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1981...
